name: Digital Exorcist
description:
A gruesome murder, a mysterious suicide, a shadowy internet cult.

While everyone is celebrating the coming of the new year 1999, retired Digital Exorcist Sawyer and his computerized partner Tomodachi run into a grisly scene that will make this jaded investigator remember all the old techniques he learned at the agency.

Travel into a world where cyberdemons live all around us in this Adventure Game/Visual Novel inspired by Snatcher and The Silver Case. Do you have what it takes to become a Digital Exorcist?

THE SIDES OF THE INFORMATION HIGHWAY ARE CRADLED BY A LAKE OF BLOOD.

Check out the Digital Exorcist OST here! Controls:

Press Alt+Enter to toggle fullscreen.
Drag the window edges to resize the game to your ideal size.
Press X to toggle exclusive fullscreen.
Press Z or Select to toggle the game's zoom level.
Press M to mute the music.
Press N to mute the sound.
Use your Mouse, Arrow Keys, WASD or Joysticks to select options.
Use LMB, Space, Return or South Button to proceed/choose option.
Press ESC or Start to pause.
Scroll up, press Shift, or West Button to open the dialogue log.
Hold Control or North Button to quickly skip text.

Additionally, you can play entirely on the numpad:
Use any number key to proceed or choose an option. Zero will always choose the last option.
Use + to open the log.
Use 2 and 8 to scroll in the log menu.
Use - to open the pause menu.
Use Enter to quickly skip text.
Press * to toggle the game's size.
